t=input()
t=int(t)
while(t):
    t=t-1
    n1=input()
    n2=input()
    n1=int(n1)
    n2=int(n2)
    n1=str(n1)
    n2=str(n2)
    a=[]
    b=[]
    for i in range(0,len(n1)):
        a.append((n1[i]))
    for i in range(0,len(n2)):
        b.append((n2[i]))
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    if(a==b):
        print (1)
    else:
        print (0)
